name.es: Fondo de pantalla de Shoto Todoroki
name.pt_BR,pt_PT: Papel de parede de Shoto Todoroki

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper turn new tab to custom MHA Shoto Todoroki background. Shoto Todoroki theme for My Hero Academia anime fans.
short.ca: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper canvia la pestanya nova amb el fons de pantalla Shoto Todoroki. Temes per als fans de Shoto Todoroki.
short.de: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper Ändern Sie den neuen Tab mit Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper Hintergrund. Themen für Shoto Todoroki Fans.
short.es: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo de pantalla de Shoto Todoroki. Temas para los fans de Shoto Todoroki.
short.fil: Ang Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper ay nagbabago ng bagong tab gamit ang background ng wallpaper ng Shoto Todoroki.
short.fr: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran Shoto Todoroki. Thèmes pour les fans de Shoto Todoroki.
short.id: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper mengubah tab baru dengan latar belakang wallpaper Shoto Todoroki. Tema untuk penggemar Shoto Todoroki.
short.it: Lo sfondo di Shoto Todoroki cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo dello sfondo di Shoto Todoroki. Temi per i fan di Shoto Todoroki.
short.ja: 轟焦凍の壁紙は、轟焦凍の壁紙の背景で新しいタブを変更します。轟焦凍ファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 쇼토 토도 로키 바탕 화면은 쇼토 토도 로키 바탕 화면 배경으로 새 탭을 변경합니다. 쇼토 토도 로키 팬들을위한 테마.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper mudar nova guia com o fundo de papel de parede Shoto Todoroki. Temas para fãs de Shoto Todoroki.
short.tr: Shoto Todoroki Wallpaper, Shoto Todoroki duvar kağıdı arka planıyla yeni sekmeyi değiştirdi. Shoto Todoroki hayranları için temalar.
short.zh_CN: 轰焦冻壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为轰焦冻的背景壁纸。轰焦冻粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 轟焦凍壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為轟焦凍的背景壁紙。轟焦凍粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Shoto Todoroki wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Shoto Todoroki background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3.Search bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Shoto Todoroki new tab.
long.ca,de,es,fil,fr,id,it,ja,ko,pt_BR,pt_PT,:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Shoto Todoroki wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Shoto Todoroki background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Shoto Todoroki new tab.
